hypothesis_content.title: Neutral Regime Breakout Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market transitions from NEUTRAL to BULL regime (confidence > 70%) with BTC price breaking above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band and 24h volume exceeding 30-day average by 50%, a long position will generate positive alpha over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often precede directional breaks. High volume breakouts from consolidation with regime confirmation signal institutional participation and reduced false breakouts. The volume filter reduces whipsaw risk.
entry_conditions: Regime transitions from NEUTRAL to BULL (confidence > 70%)
BTC price > 20-day Bollinger Band upper band
ETH/BTC ratio shows stability or increase (not declining > 2% in 24h)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% gain from entry or regime reverts to NEUTRAL
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 8% loss from entry or BTC closes below 20-day SMA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of such signals result in immediate reversal (regime reverts to NEUTRAL within 2 days) or fail to achieve 5% gains within the 5-day window.
